main event: A UFO object was observed in Point Pleasant, New Jersey, on 27 August 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 10 seconds.,The object had a straight edge and was slightly flattened on top.,It traveled in a 25-degree arc and appeared jet-like.,The object was reported to be traveling faster than known jet aircraft.,The report indicates there were no photographs taken of the sighting.
witness description: observed the object from below and ahead
